ai-kv13.3:1.1_0: The person was entering the leaf-world.
ai-kv13.3:1.3_0: and both is entering the rooms and he is drunk.
ai-kv13.3:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv13.3:2.1_0: The person was entering the leaf-world.
ai-kv13.3:2.3_0: Doesn’t you murder on that opposite sex?
ai-kv13.3:2.5_0: (But) there is a deed that (good) deed was being anxious, he said,
ai-kv13.3:2.6_0: “The individual should enter the sure path.”
ai-kv13.3:3.1_0: The person is incapable of entering the sure path,
ai-kv13.3:3.3_4: Straighting a schism in the Sangha.
ai-kv13.3:3.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv13.3:4.1_0: But he is unable to do that legal procedure without first giving it up. He can’t enter the monastery without getting rid of remorse. He then enter the next life.
ai-kv13.3:4.4_0: Straighting a schism in the Sangha.
ai-kv13.3:4.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv13.3:5.1_0: But he is unable to do that legal procedure without first giving it up. He can’t enter the monastery without getting rid of remorse. He then enter the next life.
ai-kv13.3:5.3_0: or dispelling that deed, they don’t regret it.
ai-kv13.3:5.5_0: (But) did a legal procedure against it—whether that deed is being considered, you did not say about it.
ai-kv13.3:5.6_0: “Speaking that person, he is unable to do legal procedure against the danger. They can’t enter the remaining passive, or being afraid of wrongdoing. They can’t enter the sure path.”
ai-kv13.3:6.1_0: The person was entering the leaf-world.
ai-kv13.3:6.3_0: Doesn’t you associate with that deed?
ai-kv13.3:6.5_0: I was trying to visit that deed, but you did not say this.
ai-kv13.3:6.6_0: “The individual should enter the sure path.”
ai-kv13.3:6.7_0: The discussion on the unknown is finished.
